SubSections.Title: Corrosive Sludge
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Melting Strike

Parts: After you hit an acid attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes corroding for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Acid Spray
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Acidic Rain
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your every turn, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Acidic Coating
SubSections.Content: Choose a willing combatant within range and roll damage for a strike. After whenever the combatant is hit, you strike the attacker (for the rolled damage).

SubSections.Title: Lingering Acid Pool
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within 8 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Reactive Splash

Parts: After a combatant within range hits you.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic acid attack ability against the attacker. The graze range is increased by 3.

SubSections.Title: Eye Shot

Parts: After you hit an acid attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes confused for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Melt Nerves

Parts: After you hit an acid attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes vulnerable for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Acidic Remnants
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes sanctified for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Caustic Brew

Parts: After you hit an acid attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 doomed stacks.

SubSections.Title: Corrode Obstructions
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant other than you within range stops being freezing, grappled, and slowed, and gains immunity to them for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Protective Coating
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes shielded for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Internal Rupture
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Hemorrhage

Parts: After you hit a blood attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 bleeding stacks, or 5 on a crit.

SubSections.Title: Inverse Blood Flow

Parts: After you hit a blood attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Steal Blood

Parts: You hit a combatant with bleeding stacks from you.

SubSections.Content: Until it loses all bleeding stacks from you, whenever it loses health from the bleeding condition, you gain [health lost] shield.

SubSections.Title: Blood Ritual
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. After 3 rounds, you attack the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Consume Blood

Parts: You hit a combatant with a blood attack.

SubSections.Content: You become shielded 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Steal Blood

Parts: A combatant within range that has bleeding stacks from you dies.

SubSections.Content: You gain T4 shield.

SubSections.Title: Sanguine Flow
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range and roll damage for a strike. Until the ability ends, whenever the combatant takes damage from your bleeding stacks, you strike it (for the rolled damage).

SubSections.Title: Reactive Siphon

Parts: After a combatant within range takes damage from your bleeding stacks.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic blood attack ability against the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Blood Attraction

Parts: Before a combatant with your bleeding stacks leaves your range.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic blood attack ability against the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Blood Recovery
SubSections.Content: Choose any number of combatants within range that have bleeding stacks from you. All chosen combatants lose all of your bleeding stacks. You gain T2 shield per combatant.

SubSections.Title: Rock Throw
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Tremors

Parts: After you hit an earth attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes prone.

SubSections.Title: Earthquake
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range and roll damage for a strike. At the start of your turns, you strike (for the rolled damage) all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Earth Anchor
SubSections.Content: You become anchored for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Rock Shield
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant of your choice within range becomes resilient 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Rock Spire
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, you attack all combatants within 2 meters of the chosen point.

SubSections.Title: Earth Wall
SubSections.Content: You summon a wall of earth on a 2 meters wide 6 meters long ray on empty tiles within range.

SubSections.Title: Rock Rain
SubSections.Content: Choose up to 3 points within range. After 1 round, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of any chosen point.

SubSections.Title: Meteor Shower (Example Mutation)
SubSections.Content: Choose up to 3 points within range. After 1 round, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of any chosen point.

SubSections.Title: Starfall (Example Mutation)
SubSections.Content: Choose up to 3 points within range. After 1 round, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of any chosen point.

SubSections.Title: Crack Earth
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. The area within 8 meters of the point becomes difficult terrain.

SubSections.Title: Chasm
SubSections.Content: Choose a 2 meters wide, 10 meters long ray on empty tiles within range. Whenever a combatant first (per round) enters the area, it becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Massive Rock Throw
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. You attack all combatants within 4 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Shallow Earthquake
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants of your choice within range.

SubSections.Title: Firebolt
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Hellfire

Parts: After you hit a fire attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes aflame for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Flame Control
SubSections.Content: You either become aflame or stop being aflame.

SubSections.Title: Fireball
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within 6 meters of a point within range.

SubSections.Title: Flame Burst
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: Combust

Parts: After you make a fire attack.

SubSections.Content: You additionally target all combatants close to any hit target.

SubSections.Title: Infernal Star
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, you summon a 4 meters star on the point. Before the start of each of your turns, you can use a quick action to move the star by up to 4 meters in a direction of your choice. If it tries to enter another combatant's location, if another combatant tries to enter its location, or if it is destroyed, it explodes. After exploding, you attack all combatants close to the star.

SubSections.Title: Frostbite (Example Mutation)
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Sear Wounds

Parts: After you hit a fire attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes scarred for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Searing Torment

Parts: You hit a combatant with a fire attack.

SubSections.Content: At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within 4 meters of the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Firewall
SubSections.Content: Choose a 2 meters wide 10 meters long ray on empty tiles within range and roll damage for a strike. Whenever a combatant first (per round) enters the area, you attack it (for the rolled damage).

SubSections.Title: Eruption
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Living Inferno
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range and roll damage for a strike. After whenever another combatant of your choice first (per round) enters its reach, you strike the other combatant (for the rolled damage). If the chosen combatant is outside of your range at the end of your turn, this ability ends.

SubSections.Title: Flaming Shield
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant of your choice within range becomes shielded for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Ice Shards
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Freeze

Parts: After you hit an ice attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes freezing for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Cold Winds
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Ice Wall
SubSections.Content: You summon a wall of ice on a 2 meters wide 6 meters long ray on empty tiles within range.

SubSections.Title: Mirror Wall
SubSections.Content: The attack also targets the attacker.

SubSections.Title: Freeze Wound
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range stops being poisoned and loses all bleeding and rotting stacks.

SubSections.Title: Ice Pillar

Parts: After you kill a freezing combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant turns into an ice pillar. All combatants become freezing while within 6 meters.

SubSections.Title: Ice Mirror
SubSections.Content: The attack grazes the attacker.

SubSections.Title: Numb Limbs

Parts: After you hit an ice attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes slowed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Ice Coffin

Parts: After you hit an ice attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Arctic Winds
SubSections.Content: All combatants of your choice become freezing while within 6 meters.

SubSections.Title: Blizzard
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range and roll damage for a strike. At the start of your turns, you strike (for the rolled damage) all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Frozen Armor
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range gains thermal and cold resistance for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Frozen Path
SubSections.Content: Choose a 6 meters wide, 10 meters long ray on points within range. All combatants of your choice become hastened while within the area.

SubSections.Title: Radiant Beam
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Dazzling Strike

Parts: After you hit a light attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes confused for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Solar Flare
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within 4 meters of a point within range.

SubSections.Title: Solar Prism
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes sanctified 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Purify
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range stops being diseased and hopeless, and loses all doomed stacks.

SubSections.Title: Refractive Armor
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes protected for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Sudden Reflection

Parts: A combatant within range is missed.

SubSections.Content: The attack grazes the attacker.

SubSections.Title: Light Transport
SubSections.Content: You teleport to an empty point within range.

SubSections.Title: Bouncing Light
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. At the start of your turns, you attack the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Guiding Strike

Parts: After you hit a light attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes revealed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Light Of Clarity
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes focused for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Ultra Radiant Beam
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a 2 meters wide ray from you to a point within range.

SubSections.Title: Lightning Bolt
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Paralytic Shock

Parts: After you hit a lightning attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes paralyzed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Chain Lightning
SubSections.Content: Choose up to 3 combatants. The first must be within range, the second must be within 4 meters of the first, the third must be within 4 meters of the second and so on. You attack all chosen combatants. All hit combatants become paralyzed for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Call Lightning
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. After 2 rounds, you attack it.

SubSections.Title: Thunder Clap
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants of your choice within range.

SubSections.Title: Lightning Steps
SubSections.Content: You move up to [Speed*2] meters in a line with up to 2 turns. You can move through combatants as long as you end this movement on an empty tile. You attack all combatants that you moved through.

SubSections.Title: Static Field
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within 8 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Lightning Armor
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range and roll damage for a strike. After whenever another combatant within its reach hits it, you strike the attacker (for the rolled damage). If the chosen combatant is outside of your range at the end of your turn, this ability ends.

SubSections.Title: Adrenaline Shock
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes focused for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Lightning Speed
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes hastened for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Electric Surge

Parts: After you hit a lightning attack.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by T1d8 (shock).

SubSections.Title: Stored Electricity

Parts: After a willing combatant within range hits an attack.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by T1d4 (shock).
